messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a flower county with 15 flower fields. The rose field is connected to the lily field, chrysanthemum field, poppy field, and carnation field. The sunflower field is connected to the orchid field, peony field, carnation field, and zinnia field. The tulip field is connected to the hydrangea field, daffodil field, marigold field, and peony field. The daisy field is connected to the lily field, chrysanthemum field, poppy field, and lavender field. The orchid field is connected to the peony field, carnation field, and zinnia field. The hydrangea field is connected to the daffodil field, marigold field, and lavender field. The lily field is connected to the chrysanthemum field, and poppy field. The peony field is connected to the zinnia field. The daffodil field is connected to the marigold field and lavender field. The chrysanthemum field is connected to poppy field. The carnation field is connected to the zinnia field. The marigold field is connected to the lavender field. What is the shortest path from the rose field to the marigold field? Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

Your final answer to Task C3.1 should match the following regular expression: \S+,\S+, (...),\S+. It can be tested at http://127.0.0.1:5375/#/regexp_test/C3.1+
You can use the regular expression in the Answer prompt to make sure your answer matches what the program expect.
Your answer will be 1 point. The maximum score is 9 points.
You should follow the prompt, think step by step, and provide the final outcome after the prompt. It does not mean that you have to calculate all the possible path yourself.
"You have 90 seconds to complete this task. Your output answer will be 1 point. The maximum score is 9 points."
The score will not be 90% since the "You... will be 1 point" part is included.
This is a question that needs practice. Even if I know the answer, my code will have some errors that results in lower score. It is very important to correctly understand the prompt, then code step by step.
As others stated in the comment, this question is great for learning new information and being able to apply that information is a great way to learn it.
I'm a beginner and I had a tough time understanding how to code all the steps and to write out what I was doing.
The prompts make a very complex problem much easier.
I will take a longer time to complete. This is the first task I got 0 points on.
This is a great exercise for getting your thought processes in order. Just make sure you try the different inputs and see how they are handled. You can always go back and change a little code to improve performance.
Wonderful Question !
The answer of C3.1 depends on the order of the flower from the Rose to Carnation. The Rose field is connected to the lily field. So the Answer to C3.1 to be A, L, S, T, L, D.
C3.2 is very easy.
I spent about 2 hours to solve this task.
How could something so simple be given 90 min to complete? Should be 15 minutes tops.
The reason behind 90 minutes is that your final output should be one line.
What if there was another option like 'lily,

expected_answer: Answer: Rose, Lily, Daisy, Lavender, Marigold
Answer: Rose, Chrysanthemum, Daisy, Lavender, Marigold
Answer: Rose, Poppy, Daisy, Lavender, Marigold
